text: Posle sego oni oba poshli, pokuda ne prishli k zhitelyam odnogo goroda: u zhiteley yego oni poprosili sebe pishchi, no te otkazalis' sdelat' im gostepriimstvo. Oni uvideli v nem, chto odna stena gotova byla obrushit'sya, i tot popravil yeye. On skazal: "Yesli by ty zakhotel, to poluchil by platu za eto
